contactWechat: 请使用微信扫码添加小管家
Please use WeChat to scan the QR code to contact

screenshot:
论文截图，支持截图后向AI提问、OCR翻译以及记录到笔记。
快捷键
Screenshot to explain figures/tables, or add to annotation.
label: 标签
Label
publicVersions: Public Version ({num} in Total) | Public Versions ({num} in Total)
privateVersions: 个人上传（只保留最多1个版本）
certPageLoadFail: Dialog for verification failed to load

title: 是否开放笔记权限
Share Note
publicTip: 获取到笔记链接的人将能看到笔记内容
Anyone with the link can view the note
privateTip: 当前文献为非公开文献，对方需要验证后才能完整阅读
This document is not public. The recipient needs to verify before reading the full text.

noTitle: 该文献解析失败，无法显示标题
The document parsing failed, unable to display title
failToParseCatalogue: 目录暂时未能解析成功
pressCtrlAndScrollToZoom: 按 Cmd/Ctrl + 滚轮 缩放图片
Cmd/Ctrl + Scroll to Zoom in and out
rollbackDataTip: 此数据已被修改，点击可重置为官方库数据
This content has been modified，click to rollback
markdownTip:
支持Markdown语法
支持ctrl/cmd+c/v粘贴图片

Supports Markdown
Supports ctrl/cmd+c/v pasting images
doubleClickToCreateNote: 双击此处可以添加笔记
confirmToDeleteNoteTip: Are you sure to delete this note？
confirmToDeleteAnnotationTip: Are you sure to delete this annotation？
parsingDocumentTip: 正在智能解析文档，请稍等
Document analysis in progress. Please wait
parsingDocumentFinishedTip: 已解析完毕！感谢耐心等待
Analysis complete! Thank you for waiting
acceptToparseDocumentTip: PDF 解析服务已受理，调度资源中，请稍等
We've received your request to analyze the PDF, and we're allocating resources. Please wait a moment
returnToLastReadingPositionTip: 已跳转到上次阅读位置
Returning to your last reading position
pressESCToExitFullscreenTip: 按 ESC 即可退出全屏模式
Press esc to exit fullscreen mode
currentDocumentLocateFolders: 当前文献存在于以下{num}个位置
Document saved in the following {num} locations
failedToLoadDataTip: 数据加载出错，请稍后再试...
Data loading error, please try again later...
inValidPaperTip: 该文献暂未入库，无法支持快捷查看
versionChangedNoteDismatchedTip: 版本已切换，笔记可能会有错位
Version switched, notes may be misaligned

title: 尚未收藏论文
Paper not saved
content: 您写了笔记但没有收藏该论文，建议收藏该论文，否则后续将难以找回
You have added notes but haven't saved this paper. It is recommended to save the paper, otherwise it may be difficult to find later.

failed: 复制失败，请手动复制以上链接
Copy failed, please manually copy the above link

annotionsTip1: 显示有多人标记过的句子， 方便快速查看重点
Show sentences that have been annotated by multiple people, making it easy to quickly view key points
annotionsTip2: 无法查看具体是谁进行了标记， 隐私会严格保护
You cannot view who made the annotations, and privacy will be strictly protected
annotionsTip3: No other annotations on this page
scaleTip2: 请输入有效的百分比：不小于50%，不超过400%
Please enter a valid percentage: not less than 50%, not more than 400%
searchOtherPapersH5Tip: 移动端暂时无法支持笔记查看，请在pc端查看
Mobile devices do not support note viewing for the time being, please view on the PC

addTip: 还可以通过翻译弹框的快捷按钮将翻译结果快速添加这里（超过60字符会添加到“摘录”）
You can also quickly add the translation result here through the shortcut buttons in the translation dialog (more than 60 characters will be added to "Annotation")

tip:
1、功能内测中，正式上线时间待定
2、每人每日限制提问50次
3、勾选原文后AI会自动为你解读;你也可以直接在下方输入框输入你想问的问题
4、AI辅读需要约半分钟的时间，请耐心等待

1. This feature is in beta, and the official launch date is to be determined
2. Each person is limited to 50 questions per day
3. After selecting the original text, the AI will automatically interpret it for you; you can also directly enter the question you want to ask in the input box below
4. AI Copilot takes about half a minute, please be patient
reportTip: 如果可以，请告诉我们你不满意的原因
If possible, please tell us the reason you are not satisfied
askTip: 有任何关于论文的问题，都可以在这里直接向AI提问（内容由AI生成，可能存在错误，请谨慎参考）
You can ask AI Copilot any questions about this paper. Enter your question here (the content is generated by AI, and there may be errors, so please refer to it cautiously).
screenshotTip: 可以划选公式、表格进行解读（试验特性，内测中）
You can select formulas and tables for interpretation (experimental feature in beta)
deleteTip: Are you sure to delete this question?
waitTip: Please wait for the AI to respond
errorTip: 当前内测人数过多，AI太忙，正在加紧调配资源稳定服务，请稍后再试，感谢耐心等待
There are too many beta users at the moment, the AI is too busy, and we are working hard to allocate resources to stabilize the service. Please try again later, thank you for your patience
banTip1: This feature belongs to premium versions, you are not eligible.
banTip2: Get the premium version to grant access
ocrTip: OCR解释功能：对圈选图片进行OCR后调用AI进行解读，可解读文本、公式、表格等。
The OCR interpretation function performs OCR on the selected pictures and then calls AI for interpretation. Can interpret text, formulas, tables, etc.
optimizedLabelTip: 反馈质量将影响账号信用，信用高时获得不满意立即退豆服务。
The quality of feedback will affect the credit of the account. You are able to use refund beans if dissatisfied when your credit is high.
confirmOptimize: 已为你自动退豆，到账时间可能有延迟
The beans have been automatically refunded for you, and the arrival time may be delayed.
confirmOptimizeTip: 为了改善体验，我们将调用更多算力再次回答当前问题，本次答案优化无需额外支付AI豆。
In order to improve the experience, we will use more computing power to answer the current question again. This answer optimization does not require additional payment of AI beans.
satisfacteAnswer: 你对这个答案的满意程度：

emptyTip: 该小组暂无此论文，是否将论文添加到【{team}】？
The paper is not in this group yet. Do you want to add it to [{team}] ?
tip1: Confirm to add the current paper
emptyNotesTip: 双击此处可以添加讨论内容
limitTip: The maximum number of words per comment is 2000!
deleteTip: Are you sure to delete this discussion?

deleteAttachmentTip1: Are you sure to delete this attachment?
deleteAttachmentTip2: 附件删除后，我的文献收藏里的附件一并删除
After the attachment is deleted, the attachment in My Library will also be deleted.
attachmentVipTip: 请开通VIP后使用，上传附件的格式不限，更有{space}MB的储存空间
Please subscribe to VIP to use it. The format of the uploaded attachment is not limited, and there is {space}MB of storage space.
attachmentSizeTip: 最多支持上传{limitCount}个附件，单个文件不超过{limitMBSize}MB
Support up to {limitCount} attachments, and each file is no more than {limitMBSize}MB

translateTip: 按住{cmd}选取多段文字进行翻译
Press {cmd} to select multiple paragraphs for translation
ocrTip: 论文截图，随后可通过OCR翻译。
placeholder: Input the text to be translated
reportSuccessTip: 上报成功，感谢您的宝贵意见
Reported successfully, thank you for your valuable feedback
emptyTip: 鼠标选中对应的句子，即可自动翻译
Select the sentence with the mouse to translate automatically
aiTranslateTip1: ReadPaper团队倾力打造的EUREKA学术大模型，强大的自然语言处理能力，快速准确理解复杂的学术文献的用户输入，格式严谨，信息准确

EUREKA Academic Large Model, developed by the ReadPaper team, has powerful natural language processing capabilities, quickly and accurately understands complex user inputs in academic literature, with rigorous formatting and accurate information
aiTranslateTip2: 在大模型内融入数百万专业学科术语，涵盖医疗、计算机等领域，翻译更准确，表达更流畅
Incorporating millions of professional terms in the large model, covering fields such as medicine and computer science, for more accurate translation and smoother expression

errorMsg: 未入库论文不支持学习任务
The document cannot be recognized as a paper and is not available for learning tasks.
tip: 学习任务为公开内容，您的回答可能会被其他人看到。
The learning task is public content, and your answers may be seen by others.
inputLimitTip: 请至少输入 5 个有效字符
Please enter at least 5 valid characters
pdfTip2: 若本PDF版本不正确，则需要上传者本人或者组长/管理员，在小组内重新上传进行替换
If the PDF version is incorrect, the uploader or the group leader/administrator needs to re-upload it in the group to replace it

title: 举报PDF侵权
Report PDF Infringement
content: 请按如下模板格式发送举报邮件{email}，我们会在14个工作日内给您回复
Please send an email to {email} in the following template format. We will reply to you within 14 working days.
tpl1: 个人身份举报邮件模板
tpl2: 单位身份举报邮件模板

name: AI划重点
AI-Highliter
popupCt: 1、本功能可以让AI自动将全文当中的重点高亮出来，加速阅读效率 2、功能当前处于内测中，仅内测用户能看见功能入口 3、暂只支持不超过50页的论文 4、有任何使用上的问题或者建议，可以直接联系小管家微信：readpaper888 5、欢迎加入内测群

1. This function allows AI to automatically highlight the main points throughout the paper, enhancing reading efficiency.
2. The feature is currently in beta testing and is only visible to beta testers.
3. At present, it supports papers that are no longer than 50 pages.
4. For any questions or suggestions regarding usage, please contact our support on WeChat at: readpaper888
5. We invite you to join our beta testing group.
blank: 未能识别重点，请点击下方反馈问题

tooltip: 应用个人术语库，可自定义翻译结果
title: 个人术语库
Personal terms

deleteTip: Are you sure to delete this term? | Are you sure to delete these terms?
